title: Sobat Laundry
desc: A web-based platform for booking and managing laundry pickup and delivery services. User interface designed with Figma. Front-end built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Punny Pals
desc: A meme-sharing website exclusively for the IPB University community. User interface and logo designed with Figma.

title: Hero Green
desc: An eco-friendly mobile app enabling users to dispose of organic waste and earn coupons in return. User interface and logo designed with Figma.

title: Sistem Rekomendasi Jurusan
desc: A web app that provides tailored college major suggestions for FMIPA IPB students. Front-end built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap.

title: School Website
desc: An admin panel for the Causa Prima School website, built with PHP, Laravel, Filament, and MySQL, to manage and update content efficiently. User interface built with Figma.
